title: How to Make Microwave Popcorn Extra Buttery

steps.headline: Pop a bag of microwave butter popcorn according to the directions.
Take a small dish and fill it with up to a quarter pound (1 stick) of butter (note... a baby sippy cup works very well for melting butter.
steps.description: The First Steps cup doesn't get overly hot, and you can pour using the sippy spout)

steps.headline: Microwave the butter until it melts; about 30 seconds if whipped and 1 minute if cold.
Place the popcorn you just popped into a bowl.
Take out butter and pour over the microwave popcorn.
Toss the popcorn to allow the butter to coat it evenly.
